name: Adveschestri
description:
Adveschestri is a dumb name and also an RPG determined by various cards. The exploration system allows the player to choose their destiny, while each action in combat has consequences throughout the rest of the adventure.

This demo currently focuses on the adventuring and combat aspects, but in the future I would like Adveschestri to be a procedurally generated full-length RPG that begs to be played over and over. Like literally, please play it more I'll beg you.
